name: Class ScriptUtils
text: Utilities that are to be called from script code.
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public final class ScriptUtils
extends Object

methods.description:
Returns AST as JSON compatible string. This is used to
 implement "parse" function in resources/parse.js script.

methods.method_sig:
public static String format (String format,
                            Object[] args)
methods.description:
Method which converts javascript types to java types for the
 String.format method (jrunscript function sprintf).

methods.method_sig:
public static Object makeSynchronizedFunction (Object func,
                                              Object sync)
methods.description:
Create a wrapper function that calls func synchronized on sync or, if that is undefined,
 self. Used to implement "sync" function in resources/mozilla_compat.js.
Make a script object mirror on given object if needed.
Unwrap a script object mirror if needed.
Wrap an array of object to script object mirrors if needed.
Unwrap an array of script object mirrors if needed.

methods.method_sig:
public static Object convert (Object obj,
                             Object type)
methods.description: Convert the given object to the given type.
